readable.title: 3262301835_9f1a49b80a
readable.content: A man is holding a bus pole in front of a building . One man holding a post and another man and woman waiting to cross the street looking to their left . Three pole wait for a bus outside a building . Three people are waiting on the curb as a man walks by . Two elderly men and one elderly woman standing on a sidewalk staring to their left .
